query: How did NVIDIA's data center revenue grow from 2022 to 2023?
answer: Revenue for fiscal year 2024 was $60.9 billion, up 126% from a year ago. Strong demand was driven by enterprise software and consumer internet applications. Customers across industry verticals access NVIDIA AI infrastructure both through the cloud and on-premises.
